text: Daniel Bedingfield (born 3 December 1979) is a New Zealand-born British singer-songwriter. He was raised in South London. His song Gotta Get Thru This became #1 in United Kingdom's Top 40 in December 2001. His album, also titled Gotta Get Thru This went to number 2 on the UK albums chart. His sisters are singers Natasha Bedingfield and Nikola Rachelle. Bedingfield was a judge on the first season of The X Factor NZ in 2013. In 2004, Bedingfield won a BRIT Award for Best British Male Artist. title: Daniel Bedingfield
